name: Where in the world is kitty cat?
name_original: Where in the world is kitty cat?
description:
Kitty cat is lost!  Help fluffy cat find him!

Where in the world is kitty cat?  was made for Global Game Jam 2021 with the theme of Lost & Found

It was made by ElfaNocturna, rumpel, rixhi, lunafromthemoon, and Lisergishnu.

The diversifiers used were:

  • Destination: Happy Place  - Make a game that includes the journey or process (a location, an activity, an idea, people, and so on) to get to a place or state of mind that makes you happy.
  • Moving the goalposts - The win condition of the game changes in some way each time it is played

We drew inspiration from Alley Cat and the Carmen Sandiego games.

Made with bitsy and <3

Thanks to Adam for making bitsy and Sean for all the hacks.
